attributes.action: Prevent non-cruelty free products being placed on special offer in stores.
attributes.additional_details: It would be beneficial for the purpose of animal welfare that the government prevent brands who test their cosmetics on animals from having their products placed on special offers in stores.  Instead non cruelty free brands should always be marked at full price, meaning people are more likely to opt for the cruelty free brands.
attributes.background: We need to prevent non-cruelty free brands from having their cosmetics promoted via special offers throughout the UK.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of retailers.
